lines: 1. Munyina sumina Yeswa laisa, Untu twalolela nga nshi,
Twalaba mumusumbo wa lulumbi, Nokwimbo Iwimbo lwa Bwansho,
Uwatulango kutemwo kwa cine, Uwa tulubwile ifwe.
Kanshi we munyina fye cetekela, tacabule nshite ntali,
Ukwikala mu mfifi nokucula, bwalaca fye nomba line.
3. Sumina munyina nomba laisa, Kabumba Mfumwi ya maka,
Kwisa neminshipendwa yabangeli, mu maka yakwa ya bwansho,
Munyina walaumfwe shiwi lyakwe, ilyo akasoka kati;
"Wacita bwino we musha musuma, ba mubuseko bwa Mfumu."
4. Munyina teti umfwikishe lelo, Kano fye mu muyayaya,
Ilyo kamone cinso cakwa Yesu, elyo kafwikwe citebo,
Munyina sumino bulayo bwakwe, bulelolela bacine,
Bakapyana pamo nabalubulwa, no kwikala na Yesu pe.
